Display Sentiment Over Time

Source: R/table_gt.R
disp_gt_sent_time.Rd

This function generates a chart showing the sentiment distribution over time based on a data frame, styled for gt.

Usage

disp_gt_sent_time(
  data,
  sentiment_var = sentiment,
  date_var = date,
  chart_type = c("lines", "bars"),
  time_unit = c("week", "day", "month", "quarter", "year"),
  date_breaks = "4 months",
  date_labels = "%b"
)

Arguments

data

The input data frame.

sentiment_var

The name of the variable in the data frame containing the sentiment values.

date_var

The name of the variable in the data frame containing the dates.

chart_type

The type of chart to be plotted. Default is "lines".

time_unit

The time unit to group the data by. Default is "week".

date_breaks

The breaks to be used on the x-axis for the date scale. Default is "4 months".

date_labels

The format of the labels on the x-axis for the date scale. Default is "%b".

Value

A ggplot object representing the plotted chart.
